api_list.api_description: Retrieve specific entry data from the Hyrule Compendium.

required_parameters.name: entry
required_parameters.description: The name or ID of the entry.

optional_parameters.name: game
optional_parameters.description: The game version to query; defaults to 'botw'.

api_list.api_description: Retrieve the current XKCD comic and its metadata.

query: I'd like to know about the 'moblin' entry from the Hyrule Compendium and also want to see the current XKCD comic.

api_list.api_description: Retrieve all entries in a given category from the Hyrule Compendium.

required_parameters.name: category
required_parameters.description: The category to retrieve entries from.

api_list.api_description: Retrieve a specific XKCD comic by number.

query: Can you find all 'monsters' in the Hyrule Compendium and then show me XKCD comic number 1000?

api_list.api_description: Retrieve information on a single region from the Hyrule Compendium.
Retrieve a specific XKCD comic by number.

query: Show me details about the 'eldin' region from the Hyrule Compendium and comic number 500 from XKCD.
